summary: With 20+ years of experience in a fast paced and demanding industry leading multi-cultural teams internationally and supporting Customers in achieving goals, I took a leading role in making Embraer recognized as a reference in product support in the business jets industry. I've recently taken a new challenge and joined the aircraft sales team, in charge of all business jets sales in Western & Southern Europe.

Executive Jets', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'São José dos Campos Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'company': 'Embraer', 'description': 'Responsible for the maintenance records of Customers under Part 145 for line & base maintenance, Pre-Purchase Inspections (PPIs) as well as leasing returns of Embraer Customers in foreign countries and coordination of ANAC, FAA and EASA Part 145 audit teams both for Part 145 repair station certificate renewal and aircraft inspections (country register, C of A issuance / renewal).', 'title': 'Senior Aircraft Maintenance Management & Quality Assurance, Service Center', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 567533, 'name': 'Lider Aviation', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGciev2qQAKng/company-logo_400_400/0/1519911098722?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=b7mu5lPI77vMLKYtDi-bpth_UCQYZSLbU-A_6FY7h_Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/lideraviacao/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}}, 'company': 'Lider Aviation', 'description': 'The largest charter company in Latin America as well as the leader in Sao Paulo’s business aviation hub Congonhas Airport (CGH). In charge of maintenance records of Customers and own fleet of 18 aircraft (King Air, Beechjet 400A and Hawker 800XP) under Part 145 for line & base maintenance, Pre-Purchase Inspections (PPIs) in-house as well as in foreign countries and coordination of ANAC and FAA Part 145 audit teams both for Part 145 repair station certificate renewal and aircraft inspections (country register, C of A issuance / renewal).', 'title': 'Business Aircraft Maintenance Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'TransBrasil Linhas Aéreas', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'company': 'TransBrasil Linhas Aéreas', 'description': 'TransBrasil (ceased operations on Dec 2001) was one of the largest airline companies in Brazil and for years was among the world’s largest Boeing 727 operators. By the time I worked in the company, TransBrasil operated Boeing 737, Boeing 767 and Embraer EMB-120s. Promoted from Engine Maintenance Technician, in charge of coordinating Engine complete teardown inspections for engines CF6-80, CFM-56, PW4000 and PW118 as well as performing in-house and in-field borescope inspections, components quality control, maintenance process and flow chart development and AOG engine maintenance team member.', 'title': 'Engine Maintenance Inspector', 'employment_type': None}]}]
